product.title: Unbranded 1Pc 2 In 1  w/ Heat-resistant Mat for Curling Iron Straightener Hair Dryer, Hair Tool Pouch Holder Organizer
product.title_excluding_brand: 1Pc 2 In 1  w/ Heat-resistant Mat for Curling Iron Straightener Hair Dryer, Hair Tool Pouch Holder Organizer
product.description: This hair tool travel bag holds everyday hair care accessories including flat irons, curling irons, straighteners, brushes, curling irons and other styling tools. Comes with heat-resistant pads to prevent burn marks and damage.1 large pocket for curling irons, 1 zippered pocket, 2 open pockets and 3 elastic straps to organize hair bands, hair clips, hair bands and more. Easy to carry.
product.description_html: This hair tool travel bag holds everyday hair care accessories including flat irons, curling irons, straighteners, brushes, curling irons and other styling tools. Comes with heat-resistant pads to prevent burn marks and damage.1 large pocket for curling irons, 1 zippered pocket, 2 open pockets and 3 elastic straps to organize hair bands, hair clips, hair bands and more. Easy to carry.
product.description_full:
This hair tool travel bag holds everyday hair care accessories including flat irons, curling irons, straighteners, brushes, curling irons and other styling tools. Comes with heat-resistant pads to prevent burn marks and damage.1 large pocket for curling irons, 1 zippered pocket, 2 open pockets and 3 elastic straps to organize hair bands, hair clips, hair bands and more. Easy to carry. *  *Features: 
   *PORTABLE ORGANIZATION: This bag organizes everyday hair care tools including flat irons, curling irons, straighteners, brushes and other tools. Holds tools up to 16.54 inches long and 4.72 inches wide. 
   *MULTIPLE COMPARTMENTS: 1 large pocket for curling irons, 1 zippered pocket, 2 open pockets, and 3 elastic bands to organize hair bands, barrettes, clips, headbands, and more. 
   *DETAILS: The zipper and magnetic closure of this hair curler travel case provides double protection. Compact and space-saving. Comes with heat-resistant pads to prevent burns and damage. 
   *GIFT: This organizer bag is a suitable everyday gift for your wife, lover, colleague, friend and neighbor. 
 *  *Specifications*: 
   Product Type: Hair Tools Travel Bag 
   Color Options: Pink, Black 
   Material: Polyester(One Layer) 
   Inner Space Size: 42x12x12cm/16.54x4.72x4.72in 
   Item Size(Unfolded with Mat Closed): 44x12x13cm/17.32x4.72x5.12in 
   Item Size(Unfolded with Mat Open): 44x40x12.5cm/17.32x15.75x4.92in 
   Item Size(Folded Flat): 35.5x15x2.5cm/13.98x5.91x0.98in 
   Item Weight: 216g/0.48 lbs 
 *  *Package Lists*: 
   1xHair Tools Travel Bag
